text:
Yes she did. 

And yes, we will continue to expose it for what it is: an atrocious #GOPTaxScam that raises taxes on millions while handing the top 1% with 83% of the profits and destroying Social Security and Medicare. https://twitter.com/masslivenews/status/959194703160926208 QT @masslivenews Minority Leader Nancy Pelosi slams GOP tax law at Cambridge event http://www.masslive.com/politics/index.ssf/2018/02/minority_leader_nancy_pelosi_s.html#incart_river_home

RT @meredithk27 .@RepJoeKennedy's vision made me proud to be a young Democrat, but prouder to be fighting to elect the next generation of leaders for our party. 

In 2019, the #SOTU audience will have more Democrats with records of service & bright futures.

DETAILS: https://redtoblue.dccc.org/

We need to pass a disaster relief package for #PuertoRico. What the House passed was not enough to address the needs of the island. http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/959188040756482048/img/dUtbT5feZ-8Nqgs1.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/959188040756482048/vid/320x180/qJg6eMel6-7K6KFi.mp4

This is the health care crisis no one is talking about. Congress must act immediately to fully fund community health centers. https://twitter.com/sarahkliff/status/959418289230368768 QT @sarahkliff Congress has quietly created a health care crisis for 26 million Americans. 

https://www.vox.com/policy-and-politics/2018/2/2/16936916/community-health-centers-congress

Violent crime in Puerto Rico has increased in the wake of Hurricane Maria. I am urging the Department of Justice to send additional resources to help ensure the safety of Americans in Puerto Rico. https://www.cbsnews.com/news/marco-rubio-bill-nelson-urge-feds-to-send-law-enforcement-to-puerto-rico-to-fight-crime/

As Secretary Tillerson travels to #Mexico, I urge him to raise the targeted killings of Mexican journalists in his meetings with President @EPN. Last month, I worked with my Senate colleagues to raise this issue with Sec. Tillerson https://www.rubio.senate.gov/public/index.cfm/press-releases?ID=E6232169-B8F7-401D-A303-F775D7CA0093 #ExpressionNOToppression http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DVC1ZKHXcAAclFY.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DVC1a_OWAAAB66y.jpg

"Each of us can do something if we want to really do it ... If you’re in a situation where you see prejudice is really being shown or happening, speak up." – Edith Savage-Jenkins, NJ civil rights leader, 1924-2017. #BlackHistoryMonth http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DVCvMDyXkAAG4Tw.jpg
Time for @TheView! http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DVCto05VQAAtsbG.jpg

Our teachers are so important – but enrollment in teacher prep programs has fallen 35% over the past 5 years. 

That's why I'm in NJ today to introduce new legislation with @BillPascrell to invest in American teachers! http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DVDFuvlX4AAUo1-.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DVDFussXUAE3nyj.jpg

We’ve lost too many children, classmates, friends, and family members to gun violence. It’s had a devastating impact on our communities. When do we say enough is enough and actually pass common-sense gun safety laws?

We must all speak out against this out-of-control behavior, and Congress must act to quickly advance legislation protecting the special counsel from further interference including my bill, the Special Counsel Protection Act #NunesMemo
The #NunesMemo was written and selectively edited by those with a stated agenda of protecting the President above all else, even our national security.
In doing the bidding of President Trump, Congressman Nunes is engaging in willfully reckless, partisan, and obstructive behavior. #NunesMemo

President Trump and his allies in Congress are stopping at nothing to interfere with the special counsel’s Russia probe—even if it means undermining American national security, and degrading the rule of law. #NunesMemo
In America, we swear an allegiance to the Constitution, not the person in the Oval Office. No one is above the law. #NunesMemo

RT @SenatorBaldwin It’s been over 4 months since funding for Community Health Centers expired. 26 million Americans, including 300,000 Wisconsinites rely on community health centers to get the care they need. We have to take action to fund them now. 
https://www.vox.com/policy-and-politics/2018/2/2/16936916/community-health-centers-congress

State Dept is right to name Hamas leader Ismail Haniyeh as a Specially Designated Global Terrorist (SDGT). He & other Hamas members are linked to many attacks against U.S. & Israeli citizens & continue to directly threaten American interests in the region https://www.state.gov/r/pa/prs/ps/2018/01/277792.htm

What Republicans & Trump have done is beyond dangerous. Never in the history of our country have we had elected ‘leaders’ do another country’s bidding—especially one that deliberately continues to meddle & undermine our democracy. Remember this; channel your outrage at the polls.
Today @FEMA announced more than $2 million in reimbursement to St. John's County for #HurricaneMatthew recovery. #Sayfie

What is Trump afraid of? According to news reports President Trump himself has acknowledged that the release of the Nunes memo was designed to disrupt Robert Mueller’s investigation. No political stunt should interfere with the special counsel’s work.
The fact that Congressional Republicans and the White House would release a memo the FBI itself says is misleading is a sad example of a political party putting partisanship above patriotism.

The release of the Nunes memo is a blatant attempt by House Republicans and the White House to disrupt the critically important investigation into Russia’s interference in the 2016 election and possible collusion between Russia and the Trump campaign.

This is not about transparency. This is an effort to weaponize classified information for political gain and expediency. This is the White House continuing its attacks on the American intelligence community. https://twitter.com/AP_Politics/status/959469536020975616 QT @AP_Politics BREAKING: White House declassifies GOP memo on Russia probe, clearing way for House panel to release allegations of FBI misconduct.

While I applaud the release of this memo, I also call for Congress to take immediate action to help prevent such behavior in the future. Read my full statement here: https://www.paul.senate.gov/news/dr-rand-paul-calls-congress-rein-surveillance-state #MemoDay
Happy birthday to my friend and colleague @JohnCornyn!

The only thing shocking about the GOP's partisan memo is the contempt its release shows for the rule of law & American national security. Russia is still trying to undermine our democracy – until this government starts putting this country ahead of politics, we are all at risk.

We need to build a health care system that puts the lives of patients over the whims and profits of insurance companies, where being poor or unemployed or just unlucky doesn’t mean a death sentence.
https://splinternews.com/how-to-not-die-in-america-1822555151

This week @GOPHELP released a paper that argues for gutting accountability for shady #4profit colleges – like cheating students is no big deal. I don’t know about you – but I think that’s ridiculous. Black unemployment rose from a record low of 6.8% in December to 7.7% this past January. We can, and must, do better. 
https://twitter.com/CNBC/status/959430400291561472 QT @CNBC Black unemployment spikes to 7.7%, up from record low https://trib.al/p4REfsr

It's not "playing politics" to expect a nominee to be truthful when testifying before Congress. It's the bare minimum – and K.T. McFarland failed to meet this standard.
https://www.nytimes.com/2017/12/04/us/politics/kt-mcfarland-flynn-russia-emails-congressional-testimony.html http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DVELtJWX4AUGMCG.jpg

They dropped this at height of the #NunesMemo. These so-called GOP leaders, who should be working across the aisle to strengthen these key initiatives are: 1) hoping you‘re distracted; and 2) plotting to destroy your Medicare, Medicaid & Social Security.

https://trib.al/NYhjBmM

Legal aid should be accessible to all citizens, not just the top 1%.
https://twitter.com/ACLU/status/959122918021181440 QT @ACLU Here's Jeff Sessions yet again putting barriers in the way of poor defendants. We'll keep fighting for access to counsel for all. https://www.nytimes.com/2018/02/01/us/politics/office-of-access-to-justice-department-closed.html

.@realDonaldTrump just released his new nuclear strategy, which calls for more nuclear weapons that are easier to use. This flies in the face of decades of American leadership in building a safer world – one with fewer nuclear weapons. #NuclearPostureReview http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DVECMZjWsAET1KE.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DVECMZ2WAAAeQmN.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DVECMZmW4AAeBXh.jpg

We've lost 900,000 jobs in two decades thanks to NAFTA. The status quo must change. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DVDpeGvXcAIXmZ7.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/959521748726185984/vid/320x180/FN0o43pejCKVNEQo.mp4

My advice to Black girls everywhere: whenever you find yourself in a room where there aren't a lot of people who look like you — be it a classroom, or a boardroom, or a courtroom — remember that you have an entire community in that room with you, all of us cheering you on.

.@realDonaldTrump has filled our top economic jobs with people obsessed with sucking up to Wall Street, & today is Yellen’s last day at the Fed. Tomorrow, her replacement will face a choice: show the same kind of courage – or own the next financial crisis. https://www.cnbc.com/2018/02/02/federal-reserve-orders-wells-fargo-to-replace-four-board-members-restricts-growth-because-consumer-abuses.html

The massive fraud at Wells Fargo showed the whole country that we need more accountability on Wall Street. But for more than a year, we've watched as @realDonaldTrump and his government have raced to turn the big banks loose again to once again threaten our whole economy.

Chair Yellen’s decision today to freeze the growth of Wells Fargo until it shapes up also demonstrates that we have the tools to rein in Wall Street – if our regulators have the guts to use them. This one hits them where it hurts.

Fines alone will never rein in fraudulent behavior at the big banks. We need tough penalties that affect the actual lives of the people who run the banks. By pushing out Board Members at Wells Fargo, Chair Yellen sent a strong message.  https://www.warren.senate.gov/?p=press_release&id=1694

For months, I have repeatedly pressed Janet Yellen to hold Wells Fargo accountable for its fake accounts scam and push out responsible Board Members. Today she did it – in her last act as Fed Chair. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DEt2iaLXcAA5NXg.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/885930219911229440/vid/320x180/KLB-NmjfFDANY0a4.mp4

In 1992, thirty-one years after America first launched a man into space, Dr. Mae Jemison became the first black woman in space. While on board the space shuttle Endeavour, Jemison conducted experiments on weightlessness and motion sickness, on both the crew and herself. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DVE7F1JU8AAoLQg.jpg

All of us have a responsibility to speak out and demand Congress acts to save Dreamers. They grew up here, pledging allegiance to the only flag they know – the American flag. Sending them back to countries they don’t know would be heartless.
